ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are thankful to all the informants who offered us, through the years, their traditional knowledge on food plants, and to all colleagues who participated in any ethnobotanical survey in the area studied. Ester Bronsoms, Anne M. Cauwet-Marc, Esteve Clavaguera, Guillem Figueras, Natacha Filippi, Montserrat Gispert, Joan Manté, Simonetta Peccenini, Catalina Planas, Esteve Roura, Llorenç Sáez, Albert Sala and Jordi Subirós are thanked for punctual information. Samuel Pyke (Barcelona Botanic Garden) is thanked for the revision of the English.
